meanings.definition: A person who tells a story again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The retellers at the campfire shared spooky stories.
meanings.sent2: The retellers captivated the audience with their imaginative tales.
meanings.sent3: The retellers decided to add a twist to the classic fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of retellers, weaving new magic into old stories.
meanings.sent5: The retellers painted vivid pictures with their words, bringing the stories to life.

meanings.definition: Those who recount or narrate a tale.
meanings.sent1: The retellers gathered around the fire to share their adventures.
meanings.sent2: In the library, the retellers entertained children with folklore from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The retellers couldn't resist adding a humorous twist to the historical account.
meanings.sent4: Among the retellers, she stood out for her ability to make every story unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The retellers' voices echoed through the halls, enchanting all who listened.
